SEARCH
Module org.redsox.lancastersfx
Package org.redsox.lancastersfx.core

Class Chef

java.lang.Object
org.redsox.lancastersfx.core.Chef
Direct Known Subclasses:
HeadChef, SousChef
public class Chef extends Object
The Chef class represents a chef in a restaurant. Each chef has an id, a name, and works in a specific kitchen.
